You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story 
Copyright (c) 1994, 1995, 1996 by Graham Nelson.

Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story

Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story

Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story

Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.

Ramshackle Hut

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

A pleasant pocket valley in the grassy hills, through which a trail runs north-to-south.
There is a chestnut horse here, munching on a pile of oats.

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

Pocket Valley
A pleasant pocket valley in the grassy hills, through which a trail runs north-to-south.

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story 
Copyright (c) 1994, 1995, 1996 by Graham Nelson.
Release 5 / Serial number 961216 / Inform v6.10 Library 6/3
Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

reward: 0

Pocket Valley
A pleasant pocket valley in the grassy hills, through which a trail runs north-to-south.
There is a chestnut horse here, munching on a pile of oats.

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story 
Copyright (c) 1994, 1995, 1996 by Graham Nelson.
Release 5 / Serial number 961216 / Inform v6.10 Library 6/3
Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story 
Copyright (c) 1994, 1995, 1996 by Graham Nelson.
Release 5 / Serial number 961216 / Inform v6.10 Library 6/3
Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.
selected action: "examine furniture"
reward: 0

observation: Searching through the furniture, which is good for nothing but firewood now, you come across an old cedarwood box, which you pick up for a closer look.

Pocket Valley
A pleasant pocket valley in the grassy hills, through which a trail runs north-to-south.
There is a chestnut horse here, munching on a pile of oats.

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story 
Copyright (c) 1994, 1995, 1996 by Graham Nelson.

Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

- history: 
observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story 
Copyright (c) 1994, 1995, 1996 by Graham Nelson.
Release 5 / Serial number 961216 / Inform v6.10 Library 6/3
Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story 
Copyright (c) 1994, 1995, 1996 by Graham Nelson.
Release 5 / Serial number 961216 / Inform v6.10 Library 6/3
Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

observation: 



[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES
An Interactive Short Story

Standard interpreter 1.0

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.

[Welcome to a short story called "Balances", one of the example games for the Inform design system. Some people may recognise the setting, but others might like to type "how do spells work" - the game responds to a few such questions.] 

You feel a little confused as to how you got here. Something to do with Helistar!  That's right, and how the world is so far off balance nowadays, after the Great Change.


BALANCES

Ramshackle Hut
Until quite recently, someone lived here, you feel sure. Now the furniture is matchwood and the windows are glassless. Outside, it is a warm, sunny day, and grasslands extend to the low hills on the horizon.
